title: Secondary Mathematics Achievement Improvement Program Using a Developmental Approach Based on Understanding by Design (UbD)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Secondary Mathematics Concepts (Equations, Functions, etc.)
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment centered on formative assessment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply math problem-solving strategies according to UbD stages (goal setting, assessment design, lesson planning).
Learners can improve applied problem-solving abilities by 20% or more through concept-connection learning based on developmental approaches.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans by analyzing formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
